description: For Realtors, Mortgage Professionals or anyone thinking of buying or selling a home… Let’s be honest, numbers are just a part of Real Estate. Our software puts amazingly accurate good faith estimates and precision net sheets into the WebOS or your hand! Realtors LOVE the fact that they can have answers “on the fly.” Mortgage professionals are amazed at the quick, easy, and user-friendly interface. Homeowners can make qualified decisions utilizing real numbers! Your clients will see professionalism and lightning fast answers to their questions about payments, proceeds, closing costs and much, much more. Conventional, FHA, VA, Interest Only and many other applications. A suite of 21 programs designed to put YOU in control of the numbers in seconds!
